alert.note: Alert for Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 5:27AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ohio County through 500 AM CST... At 426 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Central City, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts between 40 to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hartford around 445 AM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
